title: Villainess
description: Everyone knows there can be no hero without a villain… Or that’s what Leila Lovett believes. Is she completely insane or does she merely see things that others aren’t willing to? Her fate rests in the hands of one man. Doctor Jonah Yoshihara is given the job of analyzing Leila to see if she’s fit to stand trial. It’s a high profile case that could make his career. What he didn’t count on was Leila being so entrancing. Soon he doesn’t know which way is up and which way is down. But maybe that’s because Jonah is exactly what Leila needs… A hero to her villainess.
author: D.T. Dyllin
